slide.title: Normalization
slide.example:
<?php $string = <<<END Normalization: This example is called «normalization». It`s used to convert of “curly quotes”, special—hypens and other characters to more ‘ascii’ representations.
Removing diacritical marks: Ḁṉṍṱḫḝṙ ḟḯḽṫḛṝ ṙḗḿṍṿẻṩ ḑḭḁḉṟịṫỉḉấḹ ṁẫṙḵṧ. END;
$string = iconv("utf-8", "ucs-2", $string); $res = transliterate($string, array( 'normalize_punctuation', 'diacritical_remove')); echo nl2br(iconv('ucs-2', 'utf-8', $res)); ?>
